text: [Music]
conferences like these are good because
you can form personal relationships with
the students now it's a good way for
someone like myself to be out there and
form a human relationship with someone
and become a resource
I think conferences will give you a good
understanding or allow you to recognize
if you're really interested in something
there are a lot of people who come to
school they are interested in several
different fields and these are a great
way for them to learn more about them
and to hear the pros and cons of them to
say do I really want to do this after
school or not but it's also a good way
for an organization like mine hopefully
through me my company will be a place
that these students want to work I look
forward to hearing the questions and
having an interaction with the students
and it's really important to me to hear
what's on the minds of people that are
universities that are inside a bubble of
thinking the great part about networking
is that the network isn't just a
panelist or the speakers but it's also
all the students and participants who
show up to the conference you get to
meet and help each other and I think
that's really valuable in terms of
taking about your career moving forward
[Music]
